MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest ReadManifest (System.IO.Stream input, bool preserveStream);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest ReadManifest(class System.IO.Stream input, bool preserveStream) cil managed

Docs.param: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream%2A> property of the resulting manifest object. Used by to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
Docs.summary: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.

Docs.param: The fully qualified path name of the input file. For example, the full path may be c:\directory\folder\filename.manifest.

Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream%2A> property of the resulting manifest object. Used by to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
